title: ReactJS FRONT END DEV
description:
You will be joining the tech team and taking ownership of the product features you design and develop. As a ReactJS Front End Developer you will be responsible for the following tasks:

- Building new features for our API-based B2B product
- Collaborating with the product team to plan new product features
- Working closely with the backend team to deliver new features
- Keeping to deadlines and delivering consistently good work
- Contributing to our positive high-performance team morale
- Contributing to team training sessions by sharing your knowledge and experience
requirements:
Essential Skills & Experience
- At least 1 years of solid experience working with JavaScript, ES6, and front-end web development.
- Proficient in ReactJS, understand lifecycle and best practices when designing React components.
- Experience working with Redux.
- Experience with Version Control (GIT)
- Understanding of HTTP protocol, RESTful data structures, and JSON format.
- Good product mindset, communication, and English skills
- Experience with third-party libraries and APIs, NPM or YARN.
- Strong communication skills with English verbal or written
- Have used some CSS frameworks (Bootstrap / Foundation / Material, ...)
